profile.title: Profile
profile.description: I started learning programming in high school and work as a freelancer focusing mainly on web-related projects. While I work primarily with PHP, recently I've been working with Vue.js (frontend) and Go (server-side) for SPA development.

services.question: What development services do you provide?
services.answer:
üåê Web Application Development
„ÉªCorporate websites, E-commerce sites, Management systems
„ÉªSPA development (Vue.js, React), API development
„ÉªResponsive design, PWA implementation

üì± Mobile App Development

üé® UI/UX Design

„ÉªUsability improvement, Design system construction

üèóÔ∏è System Design & Architecture

üîß Technical Consulting & Support
„ÉªLegacy system modernization, Technology selection support

„ÉªDevelopment process improvement, Team technical support

From full-stack development to specialized support in specific technical areas, I flexibly adapt to meet your unique needs.

techStack.question: What are your main technology stacks?
techStack.answer:
Frontend: React, Vue.js, TypeScript, HTML5/CSS3
Backend: PHP, Node.js, Go, Python
Mobile: Swift (iOS), Kotlin (Android), React Native
Infrastructure: AWS, Docker, GitHub Actions
I select the optimal technology based on project requirements.

pricing.question: What is your pricing structure?
pricing.answer: I provide individual quotes based on project scale, duration, and technical requirements. I support both hourly rate contracts and fixed-price development contracts. Please feel free to contact me first. I offer free consultation and estimates.

timeline.question: How long does development typically take?
timeline.answer:
It varies greatly depending on project scale and complexity, but here are rough estimates:
Simple Website: 1-2 weeks
Medium Web App: 1-3 months
Mobile App: 2-4 months
Large System: 4+ months
I'll provide an accurate schedule during the requirements definition phase.

support.question: Do you provide post-delivery support?
support.answer:
Yes. I provide the following post-delivery support:
- Bug fix support (free for 1 month after delivery)
- Operations & maintenance support (monthly contract)
- Feature addition & modification support
- Technical question support
I value long-term relationships and strive to provide continuous support.

migration.question: Can you handle integration with existing systems or migration?
migration.answer: Yes, absolutely. I have experience with various patterns including legacy system modernization, database migration, API integration, and gradual system migration. First, let me understand your current system configuration, and I'll propose the optimal migration plan.

remote.question: Can you work remotely?
remote.answer: Yes, I fully support remote development. I use tools like Slack, Zoom, GitHub, and Figma for efficient communication and development progress management. I provide regular progress reports and set up online meetings as needed.

smallProjects.question: Can I request small modifications or consultations only?
smallProjects.answer: Of course! I handle everything from small fixes that take just a few hours to technical consultations only. Please feel free to contact me. I provide careful support regardless of project size.

emergency.question: Can you handle emergency situations?
emergency.answer: I respond as quickly as possible to emergency situations such as system failures. For customers with maintenance contracts, I provide dedicated emergency contact information and prioritized support.

security.question: How do you handle security measures?
security.answer:
I implement the following security measures from the development stage:
- Secure coding practices
- Regular vulnerability scanning
- HTTPS/SSL certificate setup
- Data encryption
- Access control implementation
- Regular security updates
I handle customer confidential information with utmost care.

testing.question: How do you handle testing and debugging?
testing.answer: For quality assurance, I implement the following testing strategies: automated unit tests, integration tests, E2E tests, cross-browser testing, mobile device testing, and performance testing. I also conduct code reviews and maintain continuous quality management through CI/CD pipelines.

communication.question: What are the communication methods during project progress?
communication.answer: I provide regular progress reports (weekly reports), real-time communication via Slack/ChatWork, online meetings as needed (Zoom/Google Meet), code reviews through GitHub/GitLab, and transparent progress management using project management tools (Trello/Notion).
